DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Table 1 Adams_et_al_2015
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Table 1. Site locations, sampling dates and effort, numbers of sculpin captured, and habitat data for spring and summer samples from 2006 - 2009. For the Clark Fork River, we arbitrarily set "distance to mouth" = 0.00 for reach 1. Latitude and longitude are given in decimal degrees in the NAD83 datum.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: interspecific segregation
sculpin
distribution
habitat
